item.title: Tools
item.description: There are so many tools that help us to build APIs/services regardless they are monolithic applications or microservices and here is a small list. Hugo is used to create the document site for networknt.github.io and all our document sites for each repository. Memory Monitoring on MacOS while doing performance test WRK is used as client for performance test. Minikube is a single node Kubernetes cluster for developers to work on laptop.
